item.title: Investigating the Error Imbalance of Large-Scale Machine Learning Potentials in Catalysis
item.description:
Kareem Abdelmaqsoud, Muhammed Shuaibi, Adeesh Kolluru, Raffaele Cheula, John R. Kitchin, Catalysis Science & Technology. None(None)] 2024. https://openalex.org/W4401579937
Machine learning potentials (MLPs) have greatly accelerated atomistic simulations for material dis- covery. The Open Catalyst 2020 (OC20) dataset is one of the largest datasets for training MLPs for heterogeneous...
